message.content:
{"id": "124610", "title": "Adding a filter on a boolean computed column causes an error.", "description": "When a filter is added on a boolean computed column, it causes an error.", "OB": "The bug report does not provide specific details about the error that occurs when adding a filter on a boolean computed column.", "EB": "The error message should be included in the bug report to provide more information about the issue.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new BIRT sample data source and a dataset from the table 'orders'.
2. Create a computed column with the following settings:
   - Name: 'yes/no'
   - Type: Any (not specifically boolean)
   - Value: if(row[1]%2==0) { true; } else { false; }
3. Drag the dataset from the Data Explorer to the Layout.
4. Select the table and click on the 'Filters' tab in the Property Editor.
5. Click on the 'Add' button.
6. Select 'yes/no' as the Expression and 'Is True' as the Operator.
7. [Add more steps as needed to reproduce the issue.]" }

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

New a BIRT sample data source and a dataset from table "orders"2. Create a computed column with name="yes/no", type = any(no boolean for choose),value=if(row[1]%2==0){true;}else{false;}3. Drag the dataset from Data Explorer to Layout4. Select the table, click Filters tab in Property Editor.5. Click Add button.6. Select yes/no as Expression, Is True as Operator.7. '}
